about_the_game:
Get all "strong defense" animals of the Banana Drama universe! The DLC includes:

- The cow (strong defense)
- The deer (strong defense)

With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama. Thank you very much!

All included animals descriptions:

- Cow (moo)! Get the incredibly sassy Banana Drama cow with this DLC. The cow has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others ("strong defense" type). The cow is very self-confident and often likes to show off its beautiful udder!

- Oh deer! Get the incredible shy Banana Drama deer with this DLC. He has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others ("strong defense" type). It's lucky that there are no roads or cars in Banana Drama, because that would be fatal for the deer!
